title: Paneer Sandwich
content:
Paneer Sandwich

Those of you who are fans of paneer, do remember the healthy Paneer grilled sandwich recipe I blogged earlier? Well, I have another paneer sandwich recipe for you which is a favorite in our home. We LOVE it! It is not much of a recipe but then 'less is more' is the concept going on here. And I must mention that not only is it healthy, its simply delicious and will have you craving for more. :) 

The next time around, I will add caramelized onions, roasted capsicum and toasted pumpkin seeds for some crunch. You can go with endless add-ins including left overs while making a quick sandwich. If you do not have paneer on hand, use hung yogurt which makes for a lovely spread over sandwiches. Use whole wheat bread or brown bread. Paneer Sandwich can be served as an open faced sandwich too.
